data.name: AboutTxt
data.value: I was born on the 23rd of November of 1989 in Kadikoy, Istanbul. My childhood was in the neighborhood where I was born. My first acquaintance with computer and technology started when I became an assistant in the computer lab of the school during elementary school years, such as inserting and removing parts and formatting. This situation, which started as a hobby at first, gradually turned into love. Now I will be happy to offer you my services.

data.name: Education1
data.value: Since April 2015 I have been certified in the fields of HTML, CSS3 JavaScript and jQuery.

data.name: Education2
data.value: BilgeAdam and İŞKUR, whose brand value is known to everyone, have been selected and completed successfully among 20 thousand people in this program.

data.name: Education3
data.value: In this period, which I can evaluate as the most wrong and right choice I have made in my life, I have given the toughest struggles I may have to experience in academic life. But at the end, I've seen you add a lot to me. I've learned a lot that cannot be bought with money, such as the ability to analyze, the challenge of difficulties.

data.name: Education4
data.value: In this course, which I continued for almost 1 year, I also studied Photoshop and Flash.

data.name: IletisimExplanation
data.value: Fill out the form below, we will contact you as soon as possible.

data.name: MesajGonderildi
data.value: Your message has been sent, thanks!

data.name: Modal1
data.value: At Borusan Otomotiv, I have developed the web portal application used in the management of additional service systems called garanti extended warranty ”. Dapper ORM tool has been used on this application and performance oriented improvement has been made. Application was developed as an MVC application.

data.name: Modal10
data.value: I actively develop the services that manage the infrastructure of the premium management system and dealer simulation system used in dealers.

data.name: Modal2
data.value: At Boyner, I took part in the development of the uygulam gift card ”MVC application, which they wanted to be developed on the management modules they are currently using. This application was using oracle as the database and I had the opportunity to develop the application on the oracle database using Code-First.

data.name: Modal3
data.value: I have developed a stock management application for Kordsa Global. This application uses angularJS as the interface and processes very large database data in the background and is responsible for loading and displaying them in the user interface in a very short time. When I took over the application, there were serious problems with the customer and there were serious problems with the working performance. I have tried to maximize application and customer satisfaction by using both my social and technical skills and I believe that I am successful.

data.name: Modal4
data.value: For MedicalPark Health Group, I worked as a technical consultant in the project of developing a new version of the currently used patient information management system application which they consider very problematic. I worked with the team working in the company I worked for, and tried to offer my clients as efficient as possible in developing the new version of this application both in the form of winform and on the web, in the solution of performance bottlenecks and in sharing the workload. During the project, I have given consultancy for about 6 months. In this project, I also had the opportunity to use ElasticSearch and Dapper technologies.

data.name: Modal5
data.value: MODYO A.Ş. I have taken part in the development of sign digital signage ”in-vehicle advertising / media display application which has been developed for the company and will be started to be tested soon. This application consists of two parts, while two of my friends developed the android side, I developed the Web Portal side by myself and made ready for publication. This application has been developed by using microservice architecture as structure and C # as language and uses MVC and Web API technologies. I have also actively used mq structures in the previous paragraph and in all of the applications mentioned in this paragraph.

data.name: Modal6
data.value:
This project, which is being developed for IETT and will manage the public transportation systems in Istanbul, is being developed by MVC on the basis of microservice architecture, MVC application and Web based, and I took part in the development processes of user management system and fleet management system applications. MVC applications communicate with on-board computers and server software to instantly save the necessary information such as road, task, pricing to the database and related storage systems and these data can be monitored live from the same applications at the same time. The project is approximately 18 months old and will be completed in June 2018.
The user management application is an MVC application developed on the oracle database with code first, while the Fleet management system is another MVC application that is currently being actively developed using only webservers.

data.name: Modal7
data.value: This project, which is being developed for İETT and which will manage the in-vehicle systems of buses used for public transportation on Istanbul, is designed to run embedded on vehicle computers and work in integration with MVC applications written during the same development process. I have been actively involved in this project.

data.name: Modal8
data.value: I actively provide corporate project development and support services in a portfolio ranging from the software in the product lines used in Arçelik factories to the in and out of the Arçelik campuses.

data.name: Modal9
data.value: Bosch makes trucks and warehouse entry and exit of firms in the turkey warehouse management, customer satisfaction and innovation projects that have won awards maintenance, I provide additional development and support services.

data.name: Intro1
data.value: I'm a software designer, illustrator and web designer from Istanbul/Turkey. Let's start scrolling and learn more about me,
